name: Dream the Speedrunner
description:
!!YOU MUST FULLSCREEN TO WORK!!

Play as Dream, a popular Minecraft speedrunner.

Play as Dream in the scenario of a man hunt! Run from George and Sapnap while trying to beat Minecraft.

Avoid Arrows, Ghasts and other obstacles!

Currently 9 levels as of the current update!

No secret levels :)
